patterns: I want to know more about [product_name]
responses: Sure! [product_name] is one of our latest products. It features [features_description].
Of course! [product_name] comes with [features_description].
Certainly! [product_name] offers [features_description].
Absolutely! [product_name] includes [features_description].

patterns: What's the status of my order?
Can you check my order status?
I'd like to know the status of my order
responses: Sure, please provide your order number so I can check the status for you.
Thank you! Let me check the status of your order...
Your order is [status]. It is expected to be delivered by [delivery_date].

The status of your order is [status]. It's scheduled for delivery on [delivery_date].

Sure, I'll do my best to assist you with [issue].
No problem, let's work together to resolve [issue].
I hope that resolves the issue. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out.
Great! If you encounter any more issues, don't hesitate to contact us.
Fantastic! If you have any more questions or concerns, just let me know.
Thank you! I'm here to help you whenever you need assistance.
I appreciate the compliment! Helping you is my priority.
Thanks! Your satisfaction is what matters most to me.

patterns: I want to file a complaint about
responses: I apologize for the inconvenience. Please provide details so I can address your concerns.
I'm sorry to hear that. Let me assist you in resolving the issue.
I understand your frustration. Let's work together to find a solution.
I'm sorry, I didn't understand that. Could you please try again?
